conditions: 6 AM- Roll outta bed and get ready for a tranquil Tuesday in the Tetons. It's gonna be a day of sparkling sunflakes and snowshine as bluebird skies brushed with a few clouds frame the terrain. A solid temperature inversion is in place this morning, so get high early and bask in the golden radiation. Post-inversion eradication, the highs will reach near 30 at the summit and well into the 30s in Teton Village. A light to moderate breeze from the northwest will help cool things down a bit, as it blows in the 5-20 mph neighborhood. Don't condemn yourself to a life of logical limits. A new personal tour of discovery leaves the Tram dock every ten minutes. Just follow your subtle intuition because the main mission of the mountain is bringing unknown dreams to fruition. -Lege

6 AM—Greetings on another gorgeous morning, Jackson. Ride high on the Tram this morning to get above the inverted temperatures. Let the substantial sunshine refracting from the frozen landscape spike the luminosity of your soul as you navigate the nitty-gritty nooks of Rendezvous Bowl. Highs will eventually reach near 30 at the summit and into the mid-30s in the Village. Northwest winds will be light on most of the mountain but gust near 30 along the ridgelines.

6 AM—Greetings on the start of another gorgeous day, Jackson. Ride high on the Tram this morning to get above the cool inverted temperatures. Take a second to scarf down a tasty waffle or two. Then let the substantial sunshine refracting from the frozen landscape spike the luminosity of your soul as you navigate the sugar-filled nooks of Rendezvous Bowl. High temperatures will eventually reach near 30 at the summit and into the mid-30s in the Village. Northwest winds will be light on most of the mountain but gust near 30 mph along the ridgelines. Mellow your midweek mind with a little bit of skiing. You never know what you'll find. Sometimes it's ultra-seductive and sometimes more sedating, but every single time it's sure to be a sick thing. -Lege
